content: this cowl was designed to make the most of a beautiful skein of yarn that pools a dandelion stitch is used when the yarn gets to the section of oranges and yellows no two cowls will look exactly alike yarn was dyed for our mn yarn shop hop in 2022 this colorway is no longer available our store sits on the beautiful st croix river in minnesota we can see wisconsin from our front door we love both states so we named our cowl the same
